properties.name: styleBuilder
properties.funcSig: AntdTourStyle Function(BuildContext context, AntdTour widget, AntdTourStyle defaultStyle, AntdMapToken token)

properties.name: onMaskTap
properties.description: 点击蒙层自身触发,mask为true才有效

properties.name: dismissOnMaskTap
properties.description: 点击背景板是否关闭,mask为true才有效

properties.name: child
properties.description: 需要被引导的高亮目标组件

properties.name: controller
properties.description: 引导流程的控制器，用于手动控制步骤切换

demos.name: AntdTourDemo
demos.title: 基础使用

demos.name: AntdTourControllerDemo
demos.title: 使用Controller

properties.name: inherit
properties.description: 是否继承样式,如果为false则不会向上合并其他的样式

properties.name: inherit
properties.description: 是否继承样式,如果为false则不会向上合并其他的样式

properties.name: bodyStyle
properties.description: 弹出层内容区域的样式设置

properties.name: arrowOffset
properties.description: 箭头相对于弹出层的偏移量

properties.name: offset
properties.description: 弹出层相对于目标元素的偏移量

properties.name: contentStyle
properties.description: 步骤内容区域的样式配置

properties.name: nextStyle
properties.description: 下一步按钮的样式配置

properties.name: titleColumnStyle
properties.description: 标题列的布局样式配置

properties.name: styleBuilder
properties.funcSig: AntdTourStepStyle Function(BuildContext context, AntdTourStep widget, AntdTourStepStyle defaultStyle, AntdMapToken token)

properties.name: index
properties.description: 当前步骤的索引位置（从0开始）

properties.name: child
properties.description: 需要被高亮显示的目标组件

properties.name: title
properties.description: 步骤标题组件，显示在引导内容的顶部

properties.name: description
properties.description: 步骤描述组件，显示在标题下方的主要内容区域

properties.name: skipBuilder
properties.type: Widget Function(VoidCallback skip, int currentIndex, int total)
properties.description:
[skip](/skip): 跳过回调函数
[currentIndex](/current-index): 当前步骤索引
[total](/total): 总步骤数

properties.name: builder
properties.description:
[skip](/skip): 跳过按钮组件
[next](/next): 下一步按钮组件
